title: Refugee who stabbed British child and five others was denied asylum in France
description: A Syrian refugee who stabbed six people, including four young children in Annecy, southeast France, was denied asylum in the country last month.

title: Biden says it could be time for British NATO boss - as Wallace rumoured for top job
description: It could be time for a British NATO Secretary General, according to US President Joe Biden.

title: UK and US agree new partnership to boost economic security
description: Rishi Sunak and Joe Biden have agreed a new partnership to bolster economic security in response to the growing threat of China.

title: Desperate evacuees are under attack inside Ukraine's flood zone
description: There are several possible war crimes playing out in real-time in southern Ukraine and the world is watching as the tragedy unfolds, following the destruction of a major dam.

title: World has lost battle to stop glaciers melting and sea level rising, UN meteorological chief says
description: The British Antarctic Survey has released its new maps and they are a stark visual depiction of the retreat of ice at our poles.

title: What we know about stabbing attack in France playground
description: Several children and two adults have been injured in a knife attack in France.

title: Hundreds of trapped children saved from orphanage after 71 died
description: Around 300 children have been rescued from an orphanage in Sudan - after at least 71 died.

title: Euro countries were 'in recession' over winter
description: The 20 countries using the euro were officially in recession over the winter, latest statistics show.

title: Three children in life-threatening condition after knife attack in southeast France
description: Three children are in a life-threatening condition after a knife attack in Annecy in southeast France, police have said.

title: Australia to ban sale and display of Nazi symbols after rise in far-right activity
description: Australia is to ban the sale and display of swastikas and other Nazi symbols following a rise in far-right activity.

title: WhatsApp adding Twitter-like ability to follow with new feature
description: WhatsApp is adding the Twitter-like ability to follow accounts outside your personal contacts.

title: Sports events cancelled and New York to give away 1 million face masks as Canadian wildfire smoke smothers cities
description: Thousands of flights have been delayed and baseball games postponed across the US east coast as smoke from Canadian wildfires continues to drift south, covering cities in a yellowy-brown haze.

title: Crowds expected as Kilauea Volcano spews lava as it erupts on Hawaii's Big Island
description: One of the most active volcanoes in the world has begun erupting after a three-month pause.

title: Pope Francis's three-hour hernia operation a 'success'
description: Pope Francis has had a successful operation to repair a hernia in his abdominal wall.
